description: This pendant is a testament to the artistry of Hyderabad's master jewelers. The use of Polki diamonds and faceted emeralds is a classic combination, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. The antique gold finish gives it a timeless appeal, making it a valuable heirloom piece (kulasaigramya). Its adaptable design allows you to wear it as a pendant or even incorporate it into a custom belt for a truly statement look.
